named-query.name: Contract.findAllInForce
named-query.query: select c from Contract c where c.state = uo.ri.cws.domain.Contract.ContractState.IN_FORCE

named-query.name: Contract.findByMechanicId
named-query.query: select c from Contract c where c.mechanic.id = ?1

named-query.name: Contract.findByProfessionalGroupId
named-query.query: select c from Contract c where c.professionalGroup.id = ?1

named-query.name: Contract.findByContractTypeId
named-query.query: select c from Contract c where c.contractType.id = ?1

named-query.name: Contract.findAllInForceThisMonth
named-query.query: select c from Contract c where c.state='IN_FORCE' or c.endDate between ?1 and ?2

named-query.name: ContractType.findByName
named-query.query: select t from ContractType t where t.name = ?1

named-query.name: Vehicle.findByPlate
named-query.query: select v from Vehicle v where v.plateNumber = ?1

named-query.name: WorkOrder.findByIds
named-query.query: select w from WorkOrder w where w.id in ?1

named-query.name: WorkOrder.findNotInvoicedByClientNif
named-query.query: select w from WorkOrder w join w.vehicle v join v.client c where c.nif = ?1 and w.state = uo.ri.cws.domain.WorkOrder.WorkOrderState.FINISHED

named-query.name: PaymentMean.findByInvoiceId
named-query.query: select m from Invoice f join f.workOrders w join w.vehicle.client c join c.paymentMeans m where f.id = ?1

named-query.name: Mechanic.findByNif
named-query.query: select m from Mechanic m where m.nif = ?1

named-query.name: Invoice.findByNumber
named-query.query: select f from Invoice f where f.number = ?1

named-query.name: Invoice.getNextInvoiceNumber
named-query.query: select cast( coalesce(max(f.number) + 1, 1L) as bigint ) from Invoice f
